display_long_description:
🎮 BRTaggers – The Brazilian VR Tag Game!
BRTaggers is an immersive Virtual Reality experience where you move using only your hands — no buttons, no joysticks, just pure skill! Inspired by classic tag games, but with a unique Brazilian twist.

👐 100% Hand-Based Movement – Climb, run, jump, and dodge using your hands only!

🇧🇷 Made in Brazil, for players who want fast-paced action and fun with friends!

⚡ Multiple Game Modes:

Classic Tag – Run and don’t get tagged!

Infection – One becomes all. Survive as long as you can!

Freeze Tag – Tag and freeze your opponents!

...and many more coming in future updates!

🌍 Play with friends or join public servers to meet players from all over the world.

🎨 Customize your character with unique cosmetics and take part in special community events!
